alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 06 at 6:16AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches above 5,500 feet. Snowfall of 2 to 5 inches from 4,500 feet to 5,500 feet. Total snow accumulations of an inch or less from 3,500 feet to 4,500 feet. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Light snowfall along Interstate 5 over Tejon Pass and along Highway 58 over Tehachapi Pass may cause travel delays Tuesday night and Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
